42a26636-b185-4aa3-a7c9-786d8508052e.content: [{"type":"h1","children":[{"text":"Events"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Scene content is organized by "},{"text":"events","u":true},{"text":", for which three types exist:"}]},{"type":"ul","children":[{"type":"li","children":[{"text":"Choice","em":true,"u":true}]},{"type":"li","children":[{"text":"Input","em":true,"u":true}]},{"type":"li","children":[{"text":"Jump","em":true,"u":true}]}]},{"type":"h2","children":[{"text":"Blocked Choices"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Looking at both the storyworld preview and this event, you may notice that both choices are not represented."}]},{"type":"h2","children":[{"text":"Special Types"}]},{"type":"h3","children":[{"text":"Passthrough","em":true,"u":true}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Choice events without choices. The storyteller will render a continue button if the event has an available path forward."}]},{"type":"h3","children":[{"text":"Loopback","em":true,"u":true}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Choice or input events that dead-end e.g. a conversation branch. The storyteller will return the audience to the path-specific root event in the scene."}]},{"type":"h3","children":[{"text":"Ending","em":true,"u":true}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Choice or input events that completes the storyworld playthrough."}]}]
42a26636-b185-4aa3-a7c9-786d8508052e.title: Events

6505b5f5-c1ce-4846-a2d1-a8e95890f5e9.content: [{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"That's great! "},{"type":"link","children":[{"text":""}],"text":"hi","url":"https://elmstory.com"},{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"There are several online resources available to you."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Throughout the user interface are help (‚ùî) buttons that will lead you to specific information via Elm Story's documentation app."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"We also post tutorial videos to our YouTube channel."}]},{"type":"blockquote","children":[{"text":"Elm Story is currently in early access. Major features, enhancements and fixes are still underway and documentation is under active development. If you need additional help, join our Discord server."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"For updates, follow @elmstorygames on Twitter."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Join our community on Discord to submit feedback, get help and share your work."}]},{"type":"h1","children":[{"text":"Support Elm Story"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"If you find Elm Story useful, consider supporting continued development by donating via Itch and becoming a monthly patron."}]}]
6505b5f5-c1ce-4846-a2d1-a8e95890f5e9.title: Next steps

ad5da778-2252-493f-ad83-9c4609a75b9a.content: [{"type":"h1","children":[{"text":"Welcome to Elm Story..."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"...and your new "},{"text":"storyworld","u":true,"em":true},{"text":"!"}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"I've created an example "},{"text":"scene","u":true,"em":true},{"text":" to get you started."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"To the top-left is the "},{"text":"World Outline","em":true,"u":true},{"text":"."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Click "},{"text":"Getting Started with Elm Story","u":true,"em":true},{"text":" to select and expand the scene's contents. The scene will also open in the "},{"text":"Scene Map","em":true,"u":true},{"text":"."}]},{"type":"blockquote","children":[{"text":"Drag and drop the scene map tab to the right to work with the map and "},{"text":"Storyworld Preview","u":true},{"text":" (this tab), side-by-side."}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"If you'd like to start from an empty world, right-click the example scene and select "},{"text":"Remove","em":true,"u":true},{"text":". Otherwise"},{"em":true,"text":", "},{"text":"click the arrow below to continue."}]}]
ad5da778-2252-493f-ad83-9c4609a75b9a.title: Introduction
